note.p: Education: Eton College; Christ Church, Oxford (matriculated 1659); Magdalen College, Cambridge; migrated to Jesus College; MB (1664); Incorporated at Oxford (1664)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Venn; Foster; Hunter
References: Frank H Ellis, 'The Author of Wing C6727: Daniel Coxe, FRS, or Thomas Coxe, FRS' in NR 1963 vol 18 pp 36-38
Notes: Proposed by Robert Boyle. Election date as in JB. Admitted 11 November 1663 [JB]. expelled (1685)
